items.title: Digests
items.text: <z>Paper Guide</z> and <z>Paper Express</z> columns are being prepared, stay tuned!

items.title: Courses
items.text: Currently, studio's courses cover the field of <z>Probabilistic Robotics</z>, including convex optimization, differential geometry, random process, etc. Besides, there are also <z>ROS2 basic and advanced tutorials</z> for practice.

items.title: Products
items.text: Currently, studio's products are <z>research related page templates series</z>, including personal homepage template and research project page template.

items.title: Contact
items.text: All official contacts are in the <z>Get in Touch</z> section!

sections.title: Our Vision

lines.text: <zi>Soaring through</zi> the high sky by wind,
<zi>Looking down</zi> the vast rivers and mountains.

content: Propriator intends to create a more interactive and fashionable page, i.e. studio platform,
in order to make pretty comfortable environment for visitors being interested in our studio's work, facilities, and products.
Certainly, it may take Propriator several years to finish this project.
As above points mention, Propriator has no enough budget and professional level to build such well-equipped studio.
Please let Propriator find an employer and keep his academic route going first, because Propriator has even not obtained Master Degree yet.
But building a studio is always Propriator's dream, Propriator would try his best to make it!
In short, please stay tuned! During this route, Propriator could gradually fill with content in this page!
